channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Silver’s climb to $60 an ounce is a make-or-break moment for one of 2025’s hottest trades
item.description: After notching 11 intraday record highs in quick succession, strategists say the precious metal could now be facing its first true test.

item.title: Industrials stocks have been red-hot this year — mostly. One analyst explains which stocks to buy and which to avoid.
item.description: Nigel Coe of Wolfe Research says industrials have been a hot sector this year, but it’s a stock pickers market.

item.title: CDC panel compares the U.S. hepatitis B child vaccine schedule to Denmark’s — but omits crucial context
item.description: A CDC panel decided to end the universal birth dose of a hepatitis B vaccine for newborns, with some officials pointing to Denmark’s policies as a mod...

item.title: How to avoid surprise tariff bills while holiday shopping
item.description: This is the first holiday season without the de minimis tax exemption, a nearly century-old rule that allowed low-value goods to enter the U.S. tariff...

item.title: Options positions and strategies suggest selling could intensity if S&P 500 falls toward 6,500 next week
item.description: Momentum trading strategies tend to amplify market moves into option expiry and UBS warns if the market has a 5% downtick, delta hedging could exagger...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
